column4: hi, im having a problem installing Ubuntu 10.10, when it boots i get I/O errors like crazy and ends up just dropping down to busybox, even Disk Check fails with cant open /dev/sdd: no medium found, but when i burned in windows Verification was ok so im guessing the disk is fine, the board is a MSI 890fxa-gd70
and 10.04 worked fine so it seems to be a change in 10.10 which bonks boot
that sounds severe.  have you considered creating a bug in launchpad?
the only thing i can think of is maybe try changing the medium (try live cd from live usb), and verify checksum of iso before burning
